name: Labyrinth of Trials
description:
You are a young man named Arailious. Each year the Labyrinth of trials takes place. Every year you watch the hundreds of people enter the trails, hoping to emerge victorious and become a God. However, no one has in over 500 years, you dream of one day completing it yourself, not just got the chance to become a God but for the adventure of it all.
When your love gets ill, and you know the only way to save her is with the power of a God, you decide to enter the trails hoping to save your love and also living your dream.
The player must find their way through each level without getting hit by the traps and hazards throughout the levels.
